parameters.definition: Number of terms in the sequence

description:
PROBLEM TYPE
LP

INPUT FORMAT

{
    "K": \param{K},
    "p": [\param{P[i]} for i in 0, ..., \param{K}]
    "E[Z]": \param{ExpectedZ},
    "E[Z^2]": \param{ExpectedZSquared},
}

OBJECTIVE
Use linear programming to find lower and upper bounds on \param{E[Z^4]}.
